statements: SELECT * FROM energy_trading_platform;
SELECT transaction_id, buyer_id, seller_id, energy_amount, timestamp FROM energy_trading_platform;
SELECT buyer_id, seller_id, energy_amount FROM energy_trading_platform WHERE energy_amount > 100;
SELECT * FROM energy_trading_platform ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT buyer_id, seller_id, SUM(energy_amount) AS total_energy_traded FROM energy_trading_platform GROUP BY buyer_id, seller_id;
SELECT * FROM energy_trading_platform WHERE buyer_id = 1 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, energy_amount FROM energy_trading_platform WHERE seller_id = 2 AND energy_amount > 100 ORDER BY transaction_id ASC;
SELECT seller_id, SUM(energy_amount) AS total_energy_sold FROM energy_trading_platform GROUP BY seller_id HAVING total_energy_sold > 500;
SELECT buyer_id, seller_id, energy_amount, timestamp FROM energy_trading_platform WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT DISTINCT buyer_id FROM energy_trading_platform WHERE energy_amount < 50 ORDER BY energy_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT username, email FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT u.username, t.amount FROM users u INNER JOIN transactions t ON u.user_id = t.user_id;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT transaction_id, amount, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users JOIN transactions ON users.user_id = transactions.user_id;
SELECT * FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT source_name, price FROM energy_sources WHERE price < 100;
SELECT user_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM transactions GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE email = 'example@email.com';
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT source_name, price FROM energy_sources ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT consumer_name, energy_demand FROM energy_consumers WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT transaction_id, energy_amount, transaction_date FROM energy_transactions WHERE energy_amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT producer_name, energy_capacity FROM energy_producers WHERE energy_capacity < 5000;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM energy_producers ORDER BY energy_capacity DESC;
SELECT consumer_name, location, energy_demand FROM energy_consumers WHERE energy_demand > 100;
SELECT producer_name, location, energy_capacity FROM energy_producers WHERE location = 'California' LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT consumer_id, consumer_name, energy_demand FROM energy_consumers ORDER BY energy_demand DESC;
SELECT producer_name, energy_capacity, location FROM energy_producers WHERE location = 'California';
SELECT * FROM transaction_history WHERE transaction_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM energy_producers ORDER BY energy_capacity DESC, location ASC;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date, energy_amount FROM energy_transactions WHERE producer_id = 1 AND energy_amount > 100 ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;

SELECT users.username, energy_consumers.consumer_name, transaction_date FROM users JOIN transaction_history ON users.user_id = transaction_history.user_id JOIN energy_consumers ON energy_consumers.consumer_id = transaction_history.transaction_id;
SELECT DISTINCT producer_name, location FROM energy_producers WHERE energy_capacity >= 500 ORDER BY producer_name ASC;
SELECT energy_amount, SUM(energy_amount) AS total_energy FROM energy_transactions GROUP BY energy_amount HAVING total_energy > 1000 ORDER BY total_energy DESC;
